title: Five Alarm Fires Popping Up All Over (Ep 1806)
description:
In this episode, I address the growing number of exploding crises around the world which could destabilize global order. I also cover the humiliating speech by this Biden family member that’s caused an uproar. 


News Picks:


Why liberal corporations love abortion. 


Ohio AG throws water on Biden’s abortion horror story. 

A major international airport may limit passengers because of the chaos. 

Inspector general: 'DHS could do more to address threats of domestic terrorism.’


Biden Tells Parkland Dad to 'Sit Down' During White House Gun Remarks.
